homeOneHero.title:
Tsellios
K9 Academy
homeOneHero.subTitle: Welcome, to
homeOneHero.designation: The UK's Premier K9 Training and Breeding Program.

homeTwoHero.title: Dedicated to Excellence
homeTwoHero.text:
At Tsellios K9 Academy, we specialize in the highest quality of K9 training.
Our methods are innovative, effective, and compassionate, ensuring the best results.

homeThreeHero.title: Transforming K9 Lives
homeThreeHero.text:
Our academy transforms dogs into model companions.
We focus on positive reinforcement, ensuring a happy and healthy learning experience.

homeFourHero.title: Expert Trainers
homeFourHero.text:
Our team consists of experienced trainers who are passionate about dogs.
We are dedicated to providing superior K9 education.

aboutData.title: Our Journey
aboutData.subtitle: A Legacy of K9 Mastery
aboutData.text:
Our journey started over 10 years ago when we started breeding, training, and selling dogs for the Greek police and for dog sport enthusiasts. We then slowly started competing ourselves within the I.G.P.
Our quest and hunger to be the best led us in 2020 to undertake Ivan Balabanov's TWC (training without conflict) certification program where our whole outlook on dog training was completely transformed, we then started seeing everything more holistically. Our approach to dog training and dogs themselves, in general, is completely different than other approaches because of this experience. We specialize in the proper upbringing of puppies and we are very big on things being done the right way from the first moment to avoid problems down the line. With that in mind, In 2022 we started our own training business and Belgian Malinois breeding program under the name of Tsellios K9 Academy.

services.title: Puppy Training
services.text: Foundational training focusing on socialization, obedience, and positive behavior development for puppies.

services.title: Advanced Obedience
services.text: Advanced training programs designed for higher obedience levels, including complex commands and behaviors.

services.title: Behavioral Training
services.text: Specialized programs to address and correct specific behavioral issues in dogs of all ages.

services.title: K9 Sports Training
services.text: Training for dog sports, focusing on agility, stamina, and competitive obedience.

services.title: Personal Protection
services.text: Specialized training for personal protection dogs, focusing on discipline, control, and protection skills.

services.title: Breeding Program
services.text: Ethical breeding program specializing in Belgian Malinois, known for their intelligence, loyalty, and agility.

Natalia Lavrova
informations.text: I would confidently recommend Thanasis Tsellios as a very reputable breeder. The service was very personal and professional. Right from the start full checks carried out to see if I was suitable as an owner of a high drive working dog. Weekly pictures and videos were sent of the puppy as she grew. And full background information was provided up front of both parents.

informations.title: Chris Westgate
informations.text: Thanasis is the best trainer I've worked with. He's deeply devoted to dogs, specialising in high drive breeds, and has spent years finessing modern dog training techniques. He's helped me develop more speed and power in my shepherds obedience by teaching me how to motivate the dog through better play. I wouldn't hesitate to recommend him to others.

informations.title: Andrew Porter
informations.text: Thanasis did an incredible job with our German Shepherd Rafferty who was very reactive to cars and other dogs where it was almost impossible to take him out for walks. Thanasis immediately developed a rapport with Rafferty and was quickly respected by Rafferty. After only about 8 sessions Rafferty now has no issues with cars, we can finally take him for walks without stress.
